data.message: Verify and fix Duro crash recovery mechanisms: Verified all crash-proofing mechanisms are in place: (1) try/except/finally in duro_reembed and duro_reindex, (2) cleanup_stuck_repairs on startup (just added), (3) skip-if-embedding-exists guard in _store_artifact, (4) progress logging every 25 items. Tested fact storage and semantic search - both working.
data.task: Verify and fix Duro crash recovery mechanisms
data.outcome: Verified all crash-proofing mechanisms are in place: (1) try/except/finally in duro_reembed and duro_reindex, (2) cleanup_stuck_repairs on startup (just added), (3) skip-if-embedding-exists guard in _store_artifact, (4) progress logging every 25 items. Tested fact storage and semantic search - both working.
